titles.title: Cops MORE Affordable Program Act

To amend part Q of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to reduce the local matching amount to ensure more local communities can qualify for a grant to hire additional police officers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 10/8/1998--Introduced. Cops MORE Affordable Program Act - Limits to ten percent the local matching costs of a program, project, or activity funded by a "Cops on the Beat" grant.
